Name: Hexa Path
About the game: Move the blue ship over the hexagonal grid with the mouse. Capture all hexagon tiles to complete the level. A hexagon is captured if it is filled with the same color as your ship, blue. If a tile has a number it means you need to go over it multiple times. If a tile has a letter, for example, “B” you need to capture tile with the “A” first. Green hexxes transports you to another teleport on the board. To make it even more challenging there are enemy ships which are trying to block your movement. Step on an enemy to neutralize their captured tiles. If you are surrounded by captured tiles than your stuck and you better restart the level to retry again.
